isis.stitle: 9 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS INTERNATIONAL PS125-9A, PS140-9A, PSO125-9A, PSO140-9A AND PSO150-9A - REASSEMBLY - REMOTE CONTROL

svcproc.title: REMOTE CONTROL
svcproc.para: Remote control or shift tower reassembly instructions are as follows:

step1.para: After packing the remote control housing cavity with grease, install the rod.
Set the shift finger in place and secure it with a setscrew. Tighten to 40 - 50 ft-lbs.
Slide the boot over the rod, onto the remote control housing. Secure it with two tie-down straps.
Put the outer shift lever onto the splined end of the shift rod. Install the setscrew and tighten it to 40 - 50 ft-lbs.
Reassemble the selection lever subassembly and bolt it into place.
Screw the jam nuts, turnbuckle and ball joints onto the tie rod. Grease the ball joints.
Place a spacer on the ball joint studs. Attach it to the selection lever subassembly and remote con trol housing. Place the interlock in the rear position and install the interlock.

Install the remote control gasket and assembly onto the transmission. Tighten the bolts to 31 - 45 ft-lbs. Then adjust the linkage as described in the Shift Control Linkage Adjustment Procedure Section.
